Reviews.Title: NOT US LTE compatible
Reviews.Author: Harold Solomon
Reviews.Content: I'm in the US.  This phone is not a US compatible phone for LTE.  You will only get H or H+ on AT&T; and T-Mobile networks.

Reviews.Title: Not new
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Ítem described as new, however i didnt recieved a totally BRAND NEW ítem, i know this be cause i purchased before samsung ítem from different seller, this didnt come with primer plastic protección on screen, sides or back as the new One does, it even has as mall dent on the right side, really dissapointed, beware

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Shante Outlaw
Reviews.Content: Because my new phone is awesome and I really Like the features and the service for my phone is awesome to

Reviews.Title: DOES NOT WORK!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: denise schitz
Reviews.Content: I BUY THIS CEL PHONE TO MY SON... HES HAVED IPHONE ... SINCE EXISTE.... AND WANT TRY ANOTHER MODEL/FACTORY.... IN 1 WEEK GO TO REPAIR FIRST TIME... AND NOW... THE CEL IS IN REPAIR SINCE DECEMBER/13.... FIST TIME WE PAY ARROUND U$ 100,00... IN BRAZIL.... REALY.... I LOVE MY IPHONE, IPAD, MACBOOK...... IN APPLE I HAVE WARRANTY AND QUALITY.....

Reviews.Title: samsung galaxy s4 active
Reviews.Author: reynaldo pontemayor
Reviews.Content: I love the phone. Easy to use plus there is a translation from English to different dialect languages around the world.
